name: The Raven and the Sun (Demo)
description:
Help the Raven find the lost shards of the sun by transforming into various natural objects. Based on Pacific Northwest Coast Native American art and legends.

Controls:

Move the mouse to look around. Press WASD or arrow keys to move. Press space to jump. Hold space to glide. Click on objects to transform into them, or click on the top of totem poles to teleport to them.

Raven Forms:

The Raven can jump high, glide, and teleport to totem poles.

The rock moves slowly, but is not affected by wind.

The pine cone can roll and fit under small spaces.
